text:
A trailing space is not suppressed when a block is aligned right.
<fo:block text-align="right">test</fo:block>
<fo:block text-align="right">test </fo:block>
renders as
                    test
                   test
creator: ryan.steele@leg.bc.ca

text:
Bugzilla cleanup:

Problem does not exist in FOP 0.93/Trunk, due to improved handling of white-space-treatment property.
creator: adelmelle@apache.org

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
